prompt: Inside a warm, rustic farmhouse kitchen, a bi-manual robot gently closes the door of a vintage-style refrigerator with a curved handle. The kitchen exudes charm with wooden cabinets, open shelves lined with ceramic dishware, and a cast-iron stove nearby. Sunlight streams in through a window adorned with lace curtains, illuminating the tiled floor. The fridge door latches with a soft click as the robot completes its task.
